name: Functional
description: A type of strength training that readies your body for daily activities.

name: Boxing
description: Excellent cardio workout that improves strength, aerobic levels, and cognitive skills.

name: Fitness
description: one's ability to execute daily activities with optimal performance, endurance, and strength to reduced sedentary behavior

name: Spinning
description: A form of exercise with classes focusing on endurance, strength, intervals, high intensity (race days) and recovery

name: Crossfit
description: A strength and conditioning workout that is made up of functional movement performed at a high intensity level.
